verses.verse: In the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has been sore displeased <S%H7107><s%> with your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> you to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Turn <S%H7725><s%> you to me, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> to you, said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Be you not as your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H413><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> have cried, <S%H7121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Turn <S%H7725><s%> you now <S%H4994><s%> from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> and from your evil <S%H7451><s%> doings: <S%H4611><s%> but they did not hear, <S%H8085><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> listen <S%H7181><s%> to me, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Your fathers, <S%H1><s%> where <S%H346><s%> are they? and the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> do they live <S%H2421><s%> for ever? <S%H5769><s%>

But my words <S%H1697><s%> and my statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> did they not take <S%H5381><s%> hold <S%H5381><s%> of your fathers? <S%H1><s%> and they returned <S%H7725><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Like as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> thought <S%H2161><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to us, according to our ways, <S%H1870><s%> and according to our doings, <S%H4611><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> has he dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us.

On the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the month <S%H2320><s%> Sebat, <S%H7627><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on a red <S%H122><s%> horse, <S%H5483><s%> and he stood <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the myrtle <S%H1918><s%> trees that were in the bottom; <S%H4699><s%> and behind <S%H310><s%> him were there red <S%H122><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> speckled, <S%H8320><s%> and white. <S%H3836><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, O my lord, <S%H113><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> are these? <S%H428><s%> And the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> to me, I will show <S%H7200><s%> you what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> be.

And the man <S%H376><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the myrtle <S%H1918><s%> trees answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are they whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> to and fro through the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the myrtle <S%H1918><s%> trees, and said, <S%H559><s%> We have walked <S%H1980><s%> to and fro through the earth, <S%H776><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> still, and is at rest. <S%H8252><s%>

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> how <S%H5704><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will you not have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and on the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> against which <S%H834><s%> you have had indignation <S%H2194><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten years? <S%H8141><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me with good <S%H2896><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> and comfortable <S%H5150><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> that communed <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> to me, Cry <S%H7121><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> I am jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

And I am very sore displeased <S%H7107><s%> with the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that are at ease: <S%H7600><s%> for I was but a little <S%H4592><s%> displeased, <S%H7107><s%> and they helped <S%H5826><s%> forward the affliction. <S%H7451><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> I am returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with mercies: <S%H7356><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> in it, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and a line <S%H6957><s%> shall be stretched <S%H5186><s%> forth on Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Cry <S%H7121><s%> yet, <S%H5750><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> My cities <S%H5892><s%> through prosperity <S%H2896><s%> shall yet <S%H5750><s%> be spread <S%H6327><s%> abroad; <S%H6527><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall yet <S%H5750><s%> comfort <S%H5162><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and shall yet <S%H5750><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Then lifted <S%H5375><s%> I up my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> four <S%H702><s%> horns. <S%H7161><s%>

And I said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, What <S%H4100><s%> be these? <S%H428><s%> And he answered <S%H559><s%> me, These <S%H428><s%> are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> me four <S%H702><s%> carpenters. <S%H2796><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, What <S%H4100><s%> come <S%H935><s%> these <S%H428><s%> to do? <S%H6213><s%> And he spoke, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> so that no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> did lift <S%H5375><s%> up his head: <S%H7218><s%> but these <S%H428><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> to fray <S%H2729><s%> them, to cast <S%H3034><s%> out the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> which lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their horn <S%H7161><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to scatter <S%H2219><s%> it.
